document_data.name: Brynth Carrathal
document_data.mainbody: '''Brynth Carrathal''' was heir to the defunct [[Carrathal Dynasty]] of [[Callidyrr]] in the [[Moonshae Isles]] as of the mid-to-late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].{{Cite dragon/362/Grand History of the Realms: The Moonshaes|33}}{{Cite dragon/405/Heroes of the Moonshaes|5}}
document_data.Relationships:
Brynth was the bastard son of King [[Reginald Carrathal]] and an [[Amn]]ian woman.

He had a son, [[Lionel Carrathal|Lionel]], who was born in the {{YearlinkName|1355}}.
document_data.History:
Brynth was raised in Amn by his birthmother. After his father's death in the {{YearlinkName|1346}}, the Carrathal Dynasty fell out of power, however the line of succession passed to Brynth.

When Brynth was killed by [[wererat]]s in the {{YearlinkName|1371}}, Lionel became the Carrathal heir.
